articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: The AI industry’s pace has researchers stressed - TechCrunch
articles.description: The AI industry is moving at lightning pace. It's placing a massive strain on AI and machine learning researchers.
articles.content:
To outside observers, AI researchers are in an enviable position. They’re sought after by tech giants. They’re taking home eye-popping salaries. And they’re in the hottest industry of the moment.
